entry.title: WIND WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:31 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:35 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 2:57 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 96.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -15.4°C
Wind: WSW 42 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
